column5: Just looking to find someone who does a nice job on cleaning a bass boat carpet. Wondering if anyone had any recomendations. I live in the Toronto area.
Go to a rental store and rent a carpet cleaner, you will be able to do it yourself.
I bought one last year. The commerical one. I just dont have the patience to do it. Takes almost a full day to detail the dam thing.

Pm me and I ll pass a number on...guy I know comes to your place and does a full interior detail and exterior detail with a wax finish, show room quality afterwards but pricey at around 20 or so a foot

I just take my boat to the DIY carwash and hose it down.  This way I can clean out the live wells and the outside of the boat at the same time.  Really easy and inexpensive.  If you do this do not look into the live well as you have the hose on high, you get really wet.
